title: Mofough82
author: Mofough82
created_time: April 21, 2023, 02:39:26 AMLast edit: April 21, 2023, 11:06:34 AM by Mofough82
content: I’m looking to purchase a sealed Satori roll.   Fine with either pre or post fork.  Please DM with offers.  Escrow through Miner Jones.

comments.author: ChiBitCTy
comments.body: Moseph, what does ISO stand for?  Change to “WTB”, should draw more views. I dunno maybe that’s not true but I just don’t know what ISO means and I’m not sure anyone else does either l These would have been fun to play poker with down in the dale during our year long nightly games at GP (where you taught me how to play hold’em at my and that whore Cassy’s place ). Good times.

comments.author: Mofough82
comments.body: ISO means “in search of”.   I changed it fella.  Thanks for the tip.

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Any estimate on how much you are looking to spend for a sealed roll? Can reach out to a contact who would probably be interested in a good deal for one of these. Can continue via DM if you want.ISO is new to me, too, always nice add-on a good abbr. to my vocabulary.

comments.author: Mofough82
comments.body: Hello Kryptowerk, thanks in advance for any help you can provide.  Last roll MJ sold on here went for .102.   I would be willing to be in that range.

comments.author: ChiBitCTy
comments.body: Quote from: Mofough82 on April 21, 2023, 11:07:10 AMISO means “in search of”.   I changed it fella.  Thanks for the tip.  I just wanted to give you shit

comments.author: Mofough82
comments.body: I can take the constructive criticism.  I’ll return the favor when we see each other next.

comments.author: BTCOVERFIATS
comments.body: In the craft beer community I would always hear and say ISO

comments.author: ChiBitCTy
comments.body: Quote from: Mofough82 on April 21, 2023, 11:36:57 AMI can take the constructive criticism.  I’ll return the favor when we see each other next. I’m so pumped for the cdale trip. Where we eating (17th st?) and where we boozin tis the question. I’ll start bugging some of my buddies here to try and get ya a roll, I know you’ve had a hard on for one for some time..let me ask around. Quote from: BTCOVERFIATS on April 21, 2023, 01:01:06 PMIn the craft beer community I would always hear and say ISO Ah ha…well, you nailed it.

comments.author: Mofough82
comments.body: Quote from: BTCOVERFIATS on April 21, 2023, 01:01:06 PMIn the craft beer community I would always hear and say ISO I’m a craft beer sales guy so you understand me well!

comments.author: BTCOVERFIATS
comments.body: I was heavily involved with the craft beer community from 2017-2021 and then I stopped trading for beers as much as I used to. It started to get expensive and is not the healthiest so I cut it back a bit.I am located in NYC so Other Half Brewing in Brooklyn and Evil Twin Brewing in Queens are the beers I used to trade for some Monkish Brewing out in LA, California.Everyone used to say "ISO" on Facebook forums and Instagram to setup trades for the beers they wanted.I haven't seen someone say ISO for like 18 months so that brought me back hahahaBest,BTCOVERFIATS

comments.author: Mofough82
comments.body: Quote from: BTCOVERFIATS on April 21, 2023, 03:29:29 PMI was heavily involved with the craft beer community from 2017-2021 and then I stopped trading for beers as much as I used to. It started to get expensive and is not the healthiest so I cut it back a bit.I am located in NYC so Other Half Brewing in Brooklyn and Evil Twin Brewing in Queens are the beers I used to trade for some Monkish Brewing out in LA, California.Everyone used to say "ISO" on Facebook forums and Instagram to setup trades for the beers they wanted.I haven't seen someone say ISO for like 18 months so that brought me back hahahaBest,BTCOVERFIATSNice!   Those are some solid breweries to live by.   I’m in the Midwest so we miss out on a lot of the best breweries.   I’m also with you on how rough they can be on your body.  Good to meet you.   Take care.

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.body: Anyone know the latest auction or sale prices of a Satori roll prefork and postfork? I know stack bowers auctions single chips but I just cannot recall what the recent prices are for these? The last time I saw one was at least over a year ago that I can recall being sold in here.
